validation.$comment_requireComputerNumber: When true: Files without PC number metadata are rejected and filed to Unsorted/ without JotForm upload. When false: Files without PC number metadata still proceed to JotForm upload (computer number will be null/empty).

dataProtection.$comment_enableDataOverwriteProtection: When true: Prevents overwriting existing non-empty assessment data fields during updates (DATA_OVERWRITE_DIFF conflicts). When false: Allows full data overwrites during processor agent uploads to JotForm. Exception fields (student-id, child-name, school-id, district, class-id, class-name, computerno) are always allowed to be overwritten regardless of this setting.
